Test Name: Coccidioides Antibody, Complement Fixation and Immunodiffusion, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify coccidioides antibodies in serum using complement fixation and immunodiffusion methods for the diagnosis of coccidioidomycosis.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Incubator (37 Â°C), centrifuge, immunodiffusion plates, pipettes, test tubes
